nodes.text: Hardin was a male Human Captain of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War between the Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

In 3639 BBY he commanded the Thranta-class corvette Outrider that was assigned by Supreme Chancellor Leontyne Saresh to investigate Hutt Cartel military activity in the Vyron system. Upon jumping out of Hyperspace, Hardin and the crew witnesses the end of the battle involving the Hutt Cartel forces and reported the situation to Saresh. Hardin then took the corvette to Nal Hutta, where a strike team shuttled down to the surface to discuss the matter with Cartel leader Karagga. The confrontation ended in violence and Karagga was killed, leading the position of the Supreme Mogul vacant.
Captain Hardin appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic during the introductory cutscene for the "Karagga's Palace" operation on Republic side.
